name: Deep in the Woods
description:
"Deep in the woods" offers a unique touch-based puzzle experience, resembling a beautiful painting. Players can explore meticulously designed scenes by dragging and sliding on the screen, enhancing visual aesthetics and immersion, making the interactive puzzle elements more enjoyable.

Beautiful scene

The game follows a classical quest for family, unfolding throughout the changing seasons with exquisite scenes for players to discover clues and advance the story.

Distinct seasons

Throughout the game, distinct characters, beasts, monsters, and spirits contribute to the mysterious, beautiful, and dangerous atmosphere of the deep forest.

Enriching puzzles

Filled with various engaging mini-games, the puzzles in the game challenge players' observational skills, so be cautious not to get lost in the enchanting scenes!

Are you ready to enter this deep forest?
